means: 否认，否认与…有关系，断绝与…的关系

sentence.Network_en: You couldn't be so heartless as to disown him.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不能那么没心肝,连认都不认他.

sentence.Network_en: I'll disown you if you misbehave.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是你不规矩,我就和你断绝关系.

sentence.Network_en: The man who murdered the girl is no son of mine. I disown him.
sentence.Network_cn: 杀害那女孩的人不配做我的儿子。我要与他脱离关系。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... disoriented 不明方向 disown 否认 disparage 蔑视.
美国大学翻译中文 3 - geovindu的日志 -... ... 不打印 nonprinting 不承认为己所有 disown 不承诺 disclaimer.
上海学生英文报 ... transcend v. 超越 disown v. 断绝关系 tense adj. 紧张的.
Gay Youth: The Straight Facts... ... 4. ameliorate v. 改善 1. disown v. 不承认与自己有关系 2. ally n. 同盟者，支持者.

list.abs: she had never once dared think about telling her plight to her parents , for fear of being disowned .她从来没有敢想过把她的苦闷告诉她的父母，怕和他们断绝关系。
your father disowned you because you have sinned., 你的父亲否认你因为你的罪.
but Peter insisted emphatically , " Even if I have to die with you , I will never disown you . " And all the others said the same . ( Gethsemane .彼得却极力的说，我就是必须和你同死，也总不能不认你。众门徒都是这样说。
what if my parents disown me ?如果我的父母不认我？

entry.tran: 与…断绝关系;否认对…的责任;否认…是自己的
entry.def: If you disown someone or something, you say or show that you no longer want to have any connection with them or any responsibility for them.

example.ex: The man who murdered the girl is no son of mine. I disown him.
example.tran: 杀害那女孩的人不配做我的儿子。我要与他脱离关系。

example.ex: Those comments were later disowned by an official army spokesman.
example.tran: 这些话随后遭到了军方一位官方发言人的否认。

means.word_mean: 1. prevent deliberately (as by making a will) from inheriting

auth_sentence.content: Bad art arises when instead of expressing these emotions we disown them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bad art arises when instead of expressing these emotions we disown them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bad art arises when instead of expressing these emotions we disown them.

auth_sentence.content: Many times prisoners families disown them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many times prisoners families disown them.

auth_sentence.content: The problem with Lomborg's conclusions is that the scientists themselves disown it.
auth_sentence.res_content: The problem with Lomborg's conclusions is that the scientists themselves disown it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The problem with Lomborg's conclusions is that the scientists themselves disown it.
